Contents.Content: select br.ZYHM, br.BRXM, br.XB, br.CSNY, year(getdate())-substring(br.CSNY,1,4) as Age, br.SFZH, br.YBKH, br.LXDZ, br.LXDH, zy.ZYHM, zy.KSMC, zy.BRCH, ss.SSBH, ss.SSKS, ss.SQKS, ss.SSRQ, ss.SSTH, ss.SSYS, ss.SSMC, ss.XSHS, ss.XSHS_2, ss.XHHS, ss.XHHS_2, ss.KSSJ, ss.JSSJ from VI_ZS_brxx br left join VI_ZS_ZYXX zy on br.ZYHM=zy.ZYHM left join VI_ZS_SSXX ss on zy.ZYH=ss.ZYH where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 br.ZYH as VALUE,--病人编号 br.ZYH as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.BRXM as NAME, --病人姓名 br.BRXM as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.XB as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.CSNY as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(br.CSNY,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.KSMC as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.BRCH as BEDNO --床位 from VI_ZS_brxx br left join VI_ZS_ZYXX zy on br.ZYHM=zy.ZYHM where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.ZYH as VALUE,--病人编号 br.BRXM as NAME, --病人姓名 br.BRXM as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.XB as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.CSNY as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(br.CSNY,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.SSBH as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.SSKS as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.SQKS as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.SSRQ as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.SSYS as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.SSMC as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from VI_ZS_ZYXX br left join VI_ZS_SSXX ss on br.ZYH=ss.ZYH where 1=1 {0}

/*--病人、挂号、信息--*/ select br.CHART_NO, --病人编号 br.NAME, --姓名 br.GENDER, --性别 br.BIRTHDAY, --出生日期 br.AGE, --年龄 br.ID_NO, --身份证号 br.INSURANCE_NO,--社保号 br.ADDRESS, --地址 br.TEL_NO, --电话 br.MAJOR_DISEASES,--高危传染 gh.REG_NO,--挂号系统编号 gh.REG_TYPE,--挂号类型 gh.REG_DATE,--挂号时间 gh.SORT--挂号序号 from Supply_Pati_Info br left join Supply_Reg_Info gh on br.CHART_NO=gh.CHART_NO where 1=1 {0} order by REG_DATE Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.CHART_NO as VALUE,--病人编号 br.NAME as NAME, --病人姓名 br.NAME as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.GENDER as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.BIRTHDAY as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.AGE as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 gh.REG_NO as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.REG_TYPE as OUTPATIENTEMERGENCY,--挂号类型 gh.REG_DATE as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.SORT as REGISTERNUMBER --挂号序号 from Supply_Pati_Info br left join Supply_Reg_Info gh on br.CHART_NO=gh.CHART_NO where 1=1 {0} order by REG_DATE Desc
